title: Ubiquitous Learning Effect Analysis and Instructional Design Model Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning management experience and proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: For current practitioners, analyzing language learning effectiveness in VR/simulation environments and strengthening design competencies.

learning_goals: Capable of systematically analyzing learner experiences in ubiquitous learning environments using phenomenological research methods
Capable of developing design models incorporating core features of context-aware u-learning (e.g., real-time feedback, situational adaptability) into projects
Capable of quantitatively/qualitatively evaluating language learning effectiveness metrics by collecting VR/simulation-based learning data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
